welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Castleton, a charming and historic town known for its breathtaking natural beauty and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving mainly European and some long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving mainly low-cost airlines and some domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a limit of 4 hours per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
